about_the_game:
After working all your life you finally managed to build a device that allows you to travel between parallel worlds. Traveling you will discover a terrible threat, will you be able to return home?


It's a first-person linear narrative adventure with some more action sections.
The gameplay consists of interacting with the environment and doing things to advance the story, whit some fps, platforming, horror and stealth sections. Are you ready to go on your journey?


explore and survive..


solve puzzles..


defeat the enemies..


developed by one person with unreal engine 5 , it is possible to reduce the graphic quality to make it work on older hardware, however a modern gpu is recommended, try the demo to see if it works on your pc.
detailed_description:
After working all your life you finally managed to build a device that allows you to travel between parallel worlds. Traveling you will discover a terrible threat, will you be able to return home?


It's a first-person linear narrative adventure with some more action sections.
The gameplay consists of interacting with the environment and doing things to advance the story, whit some fps, platforming, horror and stealth sections. Are you ready to go on your journey?


explore and survive..


solve puzzles..


defeat the enemies..


developed by one person with unreal engine 5 , it is possible to reduce the graphic quality to make it work on older hardware, however a modern gpu is recommended, try the demo to see if it works on your pc.
name: The Voyager Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 64
  • Processor: Similar to Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1060 6gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win 64
  • Processor: Higher than Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Higher than gtx 1060 6gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: After working all your life you have finally managed to build a device that allows you to travel between parallel worlds. will you be able to return home?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Danish, Finnish, Japanese, Greek, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
